Client code:

package clientpro;
import pack1.*;
public class Clientaap {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
       A a=new A();
       a.setNum1(100);
       System.out.println(a.getNum1());
       B b=new B("hello");
       System.out.println(b.getMessage());
	}

}


Developer:

class A


/**
 * 
 */
package pack1;

/**
 * @author Yash
 */
public class A {
	
	private int num1;

	/**
	 * @return the num1 which is set from setNum 
	 */
	public int getNum1() {
		return num1;
	}

	/**
	 * @param num1 to set num1 member variable
	 */
	public void setNum1(int num1) {
		this.num1 = num1;
	}
	

}



Class B

/**
 * 
 */
package pack1;

/**
 * @author Hajare
 */
public class B {
private String message;

/**
 * @param message to set message member variable
 */
public B(String message) {
	super();
	this.message = message;
	
}

/**
 * @return the message which has been passed
 */
public String getMessage() {
	return message;
}

/**
 * @param message the message to change
 */
public void setMessage(String message) {
	this.message = message;
}

}
